H0.text: Who was sacked as the Beatles' drummer and replaced by Ringo Starr. Jimmy Nicol

H1.text: Who was sacked as the Beatles' drummer and replaced by Ringo Starr. Andy White

H2.text: Who was sacked as the Beatles' drummer and replaced by Ringo Starr. Jim Keltner

H3.text: Who was sacked as the Beatles' drummer and replaced by Ringo Starr. Pete Best

A4.text: Pete kept being sick and not showing up for gigs

A5.text: Best couldn't play drums very well. I mean, he couldn't keep time too well.
